ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle cola soft drink (such as CokeÂ®)
1 strip of lemon zest, for garnish
des: "My stepdad and I have a favorite drink that we created, and it's really amazing! It's delicious and fizzy, anyone would love it. Named after the fierce dragon in Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire, (I know, we're HP freaks) it's great for a non-alcoholic drink at a party!"
ins: Pour the grenadine and lime juice into a tall glass. Pour in the cola to mix. Float a strip of lemon zest on top to garnish.
